sourcesContent:
<template>
  Список постов
<posts-list />
</template>

<script>
import PostsList from './components/posts/PostsList.vue'
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: {
    PostsList
  },

  data:() => ({
    text: []
  }),

  methods: {
    ...mapActions([
      'GET_POSTS_FROM_API',
    ]),
  },

  computed: {
    ...mapGetters([
      'POSTS',
    ]),
  },

  mounted() {
    this.GET_POSTS_FROM_API()
    this.text = this.POSTS

  }

}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
  margin-top: 60px;
}
</style>
